## 1

\[ September 4, 2024 \]

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Software Setup

Install R, R Studio, and R packages (`tinytex`)

Introduce R markdown & R notebooks

Workspace orientation

------------------------------------------------------------------------

#### Excyclopedia

[Vol. 1 Setting up Your Computer](https://cehs-research.github.io/eBook_install/)

#### YouTube Videos

[Getting Started: Installing R, R Studio, and R packages (2023 - 35 min)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tLAZYIIVdvk)

[DIRECTIONS: Sarah's R Studio Arrangement/options (5 min)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4bIzq2vxYx0)

## 2

\[ September 11, 2024 \]

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Intro to R Syntax

Lingo - nouns (objects/data) vs. verbs (actions/functions)

R piplines, linking/chaining steps

Importing Data: csv, Excel, SPSS, etc.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

#### Slides

[Getting Started with R](https://cehs-research.github.io/PSY-6600_public/slides/ch0_getting_started_r.html#1)

#### YouTube Videos

[R lingo, nouns (objects/data) and verbs (actions/functions) (40 min)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wXpuRcpOX6E)

[R pipelines, linking/chaining steps (18 min)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iHYZ6ZJnekA)

[Intro to Tidy R (from MLM class in 2020 - 79 min)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZtaIUezxJY&list=PLtAksNetLqNpvUgGYL21LpyR7OszB-Qn1&index=2)

:::: {style="max-width:608px"}
::: {style="position:relative;padding-bottom:66.118421052632%"}
<iframe id="kaltura_player" src="https://cdnapisec.kaltura.com/p/1530551/embedPlaykitJs/uiconf_id/51947332?iframeembed=true&entry_id=1_o0rbwg11&config%5Bprovider%5D=%7B%22widgetId%22%3A%221_29il1d8x%22%7D&config%5Bplayback%5D=%7B%22startTime%22%3A2190%7D" allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen mozAllowFullScreen allow="autoplay *; fullscreen *; encrypted-media *" sandbox="allow-downloads allow-forms allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-top-navigation allow-pointer-lock allow-popups allow-modals allow-orientation-lock allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox allow-presentation allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation" title="Fall 2024 EDUC-6560-MB1 XL" style="position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;border:0">

## 3-5

\[ Sept 18 & 25 and Oct 2, 2024 \]

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Big Picture Overview

Work through a sample case from reading in the data to producing a report.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

#### In-class Example

[Thanks you Karen Munoz for providing a de-identified data]{.smallcaps} ([Excel](https://usu.box.com/s/pz56elev6tac66ju6dtph1n3jltxxyjw))

[To get started, you will need the following files saved **in the same folder**]{.underline}

***data*** in SPSS format: [SPSS dataset](https://usu.box.com/s/zvvkaa236dxofyqta44gmffn4ds0a0bt)

empty/outline skeleton ***notebook***: [Supplement Skeleton](https://usu.box.com/s/uxx8zda0fww2rm44p9r02orz2z4q5g0z)

***style*** file: [APA 7th edition](https://usu.box.com/s/f1atkg2hqt3rmvi5c48f9tup6hc3krs0)

##### Skeleton notebook after each class day

[day 3 end: Sept 18, 2024](https://usu.box.com/s/ohhzd99mt5s0vxaqekquhcedgytaof7c)

[day 4 end: Sept 25, 2024](https://usu.box.com/s/q0c04fpepqc0jc5hjofvozea221pirhq)

[day 5 end: Oct 2 2024](https://usu.box.com/s/235so3ok6ntc8uqkfvzzgrr2qpngn51z)

##### Day 3 Recording
